features: 1-inch by 10 yard-roll of Band-Aid Brand of First Aid Products Water Block Waterproof Adhesive Tape works to firmly secure dressings or bandages to wounds
Designed to be 100% waterproof, this self-adhesive bandaging tape stays on, even when wet, so bandages stay secure in the shower without coming loose
This wound care tape is designed to tear easily by hand without the need for scissors, and can be customized to fit any size bandage for optimal first aid wound care
It's available in a convenient roll which helps keep this first aid tape clean and allows for easy storage
Experience durable wound protection and first aid with this waterproof self-adhesive bandage tape
body.description: Band-Aid Brand of First Aid Products Water Block Waterproof Tape firmly secures dressings or bandages to wounds, for advanced first aid protection. Designed to be 100% waterproof, it is durable, and stays on, even when wet, so bandages stay on in the shower or bath without coming loose. This adhesive bandaging tape comes in a convenient roll that keeps the tape clean, and it tears easily by hand, so it can be customized to fit any size bandage.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us Looking Back While Moving Forward Our products have been used by millions—even billions—of people for more than a century, giving BAND-AID Brand an iconic place in American culture. We reached that place through a history of innovation, healing, and caring for our customers.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sticks well one time
reviews.reviewText: Good product that is easy to access and use. A bit painful to rip off but it is tape afterall. Get it on right the first time, no 2nd chance on adhesion.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars use as directed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My hands stay wet for much of my work shift. This tape keeps bandages from getting wet and slipping off for hours. It's very easy to apply with my free hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars NOT FOR SENSITIVE SKIN!!
reviews.reviewText: This tape did what it was supposed to do: Keep a covering over a heart monitor while showering. It stuck well, which I discovered when I removed it.The only problem: This is NOT a product for anyone with sensitive skin. After less than 25 minutes, the area covered by the tape was red and itchy. Note: I am at fault for this, as I didn't look for a tape that was hypoallergenic.
